Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Pitsmoor, Sheffield Solo cornet prize: Armley Prizes - 1ss £12 and cornet, 2nd £7, 3rd £5, 4th £3. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 26, 2017, 9:50 a.m. March 23, 2020, 10:55 a.m.
1 Armley and Wortley Prize Band William Holdsworth Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
2 Dannemora Steelworks Robert Richford Rossini [arr. Round]
3 Chesterfield Borough Charles John Elsom Rossini [arr. Round]
4 Sheffield Temperance Colin Thom Stiffelio [unknown arranger]
